tool_description: Manages external resources, references, and supplementary materials with categorization and search capabilities.

resource_url.description: URL or location of the resource

resource_type.description: Type of resource: article, book, video, website, tool, dataset

error_messages: Invalid resource_url: URL format is invalid or unreachable.
Invalid resource_type: Use article, book, video, website, tool, or dataset.
Invalid access_level: Use public, restricted, or premium.
Duplicate resource: Resource with this URL already exists.
Too many tags: Maximum 10 tags allowed per resource.
usage: Provide resource_title, resource_url, and resource_type. Optionally specify course_id, tags, and access_level for better organization and access control.

resource_id.description: Unique identifier for the stored resource

verification_status.description: URL verification status: verified, pending, failed

resource_summary.description: Automatically generated summary of the resource

estimated_read_time.description: Estimated time to consume resource in minutes
